short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly add releases from various music sites to your 'Want to Listen' list on Digs.fm

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, when you're on an music release page that Digs.fm can recognize, you'll be able to add the release to your 'Want to Listen' list with 1 click.

Links that are currently recognized:

- Discogs release (e.g. https://www.discogs.com/master/1937235-Apifera-Overstand)
- Spotify album (e.g. https://open.spotify.com/album/5fFftOUCiSbNfofIj8vXx0)
- Mixcloud show (e.g. https://www.mixcloud.com/worldwidefm/pacific-spirit-dj-ddee-06-08-22/)
- Bandcamp album (e.g. https://steveroach.bandcamp.com/album/what-remains)
- MusicBrainz release and release groups (e.g. https://musicbrainz.org/release/b6df3481-5a7b-4d56-bfba-76d4d66480d5)
